description: Details to partially discharge Condition 7 (1:20 drawings of a typical bay of each elevation) for Phase 3; Condition 8 (external facing and roofing materials), Phase 3; Condition 9 (schedule and specification of all internal works) for Phase 3; Condition 10 (1:20 drawings of the proposed works, repair and restoration of all internal spaces) for Phase 3 and Condition 11 (samples of all new and replacement internal materials) for Phase 3 of Listed Building Consent (ref. 2020/01525/LBC) dated 13 May 2021.
